title: Fuchsia
detail: End to end music synthesis system
extended_details: In recent years, music synthesis has increasingly sounded more realistic in part from advancements in AI. In order for synthesized music to sound as high-quality as possible, generated audio must sound good from speakers. This project aims to build a music synthesis system optimized with respect to both software and hardware.

parts_and_costs.part: Sound-Absorbing Sheet with Adhesive Backing, 54" Wide x 1" Thick
